attributes.action: Make it compulsory for school kids to learn sign
attributes.additional_details: I think its so important for kids to be taught to communicate with their school peers and friends in a school/everyday setting. My son is non verbal and as important as it is to learn other languages i think its just as important to learn how to sign so the hard or hearing kids or non verbal kids do not feel alienated from the rest of their class.
attributes.background: Make it compulsory for kids to learn sign in school so they can communicate with their deaf/non verbal kids in their school or classroom
